# maxIterations

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of iterations the solver is allowed to do per frame.

## Declaration

```swift
var maxIterations: Int
```

## Discussion

If the pose satisfies all of the demands using less iterations, the solve stops early.
title: maxIterations
